fallbackResponses: I hear you. Sometimes words carry more weight than we realize. What's one small thing that felt true for you today?
Thank you for sharing that. Your feelings matter, all of them. Can you tell me more about what's in your heart right now?
I'm here with you, present and listening. Even in the silence, your presence is enough. What do you need most in this moment?

quickEmotionPrompts.overwhelmed: My heart feels so heavy right now. Everything feels like too much and I'm not sure how to keep going.
quickEmotionPrompts.anxious: My mind won't stop racing with worries. I feel so anxious about everything that could go wrong.
quickEmotionPrompts.sad: I'm feeling really low and sad today. The sadness feels heavy and I don't know how to lift it.
quickEmotionPrompts.lonely: I feel so alone, even when people are around. The loneliness is profound and isolating.
quickEmotionPrompts.hesitant: I feel so hesitant and unsure about what to do. Every choice feels overwhelming and I'm scared of making the wrong decision.
quickEmotionPrompts.confused: I'm feeling really confused about things in my life. I don't understand what's happening or what I should do next.
quickEmotionPrompts.ashamed: I'm feeling ashamed and embarrassed about something. I don't know how to face it.
quickEmotionPrompts.jealous: I'm feeling jealous and envious. I compare myself to others and it hurts.
quickEmotionPrompts.gender: I'm questioning my gender identity and it's confusing and scary. I don't know who to talk to about this.
quickEmotionPrompts.lgbtq: I'm exploring my sexuality/identity and it feels lonely. I'm not sure how to navigate these feelings or find acceptance.
quickEmotionPrompts.study: I'm struggling with my studies. The pressure is overwhelming and I don't know how to keep up with everything.
quickEmotionPrompts.love: My heart is hurting from a relationship. I don't know how to move forward or heal from this pain.
quickEmotionPrompts.curious: I'm searching for meaning in all of this. What's the purpose when things feel so hard?
quickEmotionPrompts.hopeful: I'm trying to find hope. Can you help me see possibilities and light ahead?
quickEmotionPrompts.lost: I feel completely lost right now. I don't know which direction to take or what my purpose is anymore.
quickEmotionPrompts.transition: I'm in a major life transition and everything feels uncertain. I don't know who I am or where I'm going.
quickEmotionPrompts.future: I'm so anxious about the future. All the 'what ifs' are overwhelming me and I can't see a clear path forward.
quickEmotionPrompts.reset: I need a complete reset in my life. Things aren't working and I don't know how to start over.

immediate.title: Immediate Support Needed
immediate.message: Your safety is our absolute priority. We've detected that you might need immediate support.

urgent.title: Support Available
urgent.message: We're here to support you. It sounds like you're going through something very difficult.

crisisModal.importantMessage: For your safety, chat will remain paused until you confirm you've reached out for help.
crisisModal.footerMessage: Mentivio provides emotional support and crisis resources. For immediate emergencies, please contact the numbers above.

clearChat.confirm: Clear all chat history? This cannot be undone.
clearChat.confirmation: Chat history cleared. Our conversation continues with a fresh start.

en.welcomeMessage: Hello ğŸ˜Š. I'm Mentivio, your mental health companion. I'm here to listen deeply, understand without judgment, and help you find light even on dark days. Your feelings are welcome here, all of them.
en.inputPlaceholder: Share what's in your heart... (All feelings welcome)
en.safetyNotice: Safe space â€¢ High EQ â€¢ Always here for you
